Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to share desktop flow connections with service principal users in Power Automate. This feature will reach general availability on June 30, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With this feature, users can share desktop flow connections with a pipeline SPN, enabling seamless import of managed solutions using Power Platform pipelines.

The pipeline SPN exports the solution as the owner of all records of the managed solution and imports the solution into the production environment, maintaining the mapping between connection reference and connection ID.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Share desktop flow connections with service principal users.

Title: Power Automate - Share desktop flow connections with service principal users
